name: Awesome Poem Scribe
description:
Make choices to create your very own poem. There are millions of possibilities. (Very slight exaggeration!)

(Fullscreen resolution doesn't look completely right. Use the non-fullscreen version for optimized UI look.)

My Entry for The Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam, themed Awesome Per Second.

I ended up with less of a game but some sort of interactive artsy thingy.

Had planned some actual gameplay stuff, but didn't have time to make it good, so in spirit of the theme, I just cut it out completely.

This was probably the most difficult theme, I ever encountered in a game jam, but it was also the first time that I was really challenged by the the theme to actually improve my skills.

Learned a lot and am quite proud of what I created, even though it is 'just' some very weird poem creator.

Controls: Mouse

(While selecting a topic you can press 'T' to show all available topics.)

Technology used: Unity, Gimp.
